Harriet Bulkeley, FBA (amụrụ ya na 17 Nọvemba 1972) bụ onye Britain na-ahụ maka ọdịdị ala na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ bụ Prọfesọ nke Geography na Mahadum Durham

Bulkeley bụkwa onye nhazi na ọrụ Naturvation. Site n'ọrụ ya na Mahadum Durham, Harriet na-etinye aka na ọrụ ReInvent-EU, nke na-ezube ịkwalite decarbonisation na mpaghara anọ dị mkpa: plastik, ígwè, akwụkwọ na anụ na mmiri ara ehi. Nnyocha ya na-enyocha ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na usoro ndị gbara ọchịchị gburugburu ebe obibi gburugburu, yana njikwa ihe mkpofu obodo na United Kingdom na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọkachasị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke obodo ahu, nke mgbanwe ihu igwe.
N'ọnwa Julaị 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Fellow nke British Academy (FBA), ụlọ akwụkwọ mba United Kingdom maka ụmụ mmadụ na sayensị mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya.
Bulkeley gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Kambridge, ó gụsịrị akwụkwọ na afo 1995 na nzere na Geography, tupu ọ gụchaa PhD na Geography ya na Philosophy na 1998.

Bulkeley ebipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ na isiokwu tutu iri Na ise, gụnyere 'Low Carbon Communities na Social Justice' (2012), nke Sarah Fuller, onye nchọpụta nsọpụrụ, sokwa na Ngalaba Geography nke Mahadum Durham, dere.
Bulkeley bụkwa onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke Environment na  Planning C: Government na Policy
